rows.html: This game is about parallel and concurrent programming. You will coordinate arrows (threads) on the track (program) using signals and semaphores to accomplish a specific goal in each level.

content.title: Unsuccessful Solution
content.subtitle: Whoops!
content.header: Details on why the goals were not met:

goals.title: You passed the semaphore the wrong number of times.
The thread starved because it was unable to act for too long.

reflections.description: You can simulate your current solution by using the Test button.
Arrows, like threads, move at non-deterministic speeds in each simulation. They also change speed at any time.

events.message: Cannot move to an occupied cell!
You must begin the link  by alt-clicking on the signal.

content.title: Successful Solution
content.subtitle: Good job!
content.description: You allowed the arrow to pass the semaphore twice!

goals.title: You passed the semaphore the correct number of times.

reflections.description: You can simulate your current solution by using the Test button.
Arrows, like threads, move at non-deterministic speeds in each simulation. They also change speed at any time.
